author: rdonkin
msg: Modified build script so that user guide is copied into distribution.

author: rdonkin
msg: Made implementation of AvalonLogger more robust (avoiding NPEs when nulls are passed in) together with a testcase. Improved build by compiling tests for only those optional components whose dependencies are present. Submitted by Neeme Praks.

author: rdonkin
msg: Fixed mistake I made with Avalon Framework version numbers. Submitted by Neeme Praks.

author: rdonkin
msg: Added AvalonLogger which wraps the logger used by the Avalon framework. Also added an optional dependency on avalon-framework.jar. Added better warnings to build about which loggers are going to be created. Submitted by Neeme Praks.

author: rdonkin
msg: Updated status with new optional dependency
